Today in Sutherland, it’s looking good with 3 ft @14s WNW swell and fresh 25 mph SE winds. Melvich and Strathy are prime spots, with Strathy best from 08:47–15:25. Tomorrow, conditions drop to 4 ft @7s E with strong 38 mph ESE winds, making it poor across the board.
